name: PyEnzyme
description: Start from scratch and use PyEnzyme to read your EnzymeML document from the EnzymeML Suite. Perfect for beginners to explore enzyme kinetics data analysis and modeling.

name: Visualisation
description: A template for Visualisation using PyEnzyme to render publication-ready figures.

name: Bayesian Inference
description: A template for Bayesian Inference using the Catalax JAX library. Perform probabilistic parameter estimation with uncertainty quantification for enzyme kinetic models.

name: Surrogate Bayesian Inference
description: A template for Surrogate Bayesian Inference using the Catalax JAX library. Perform probabilistic parameter estimation with uncertainty quantification for enzyme kinetic models, which is accelerated through a Neural ODE surrogate model.

name: Parameter Estimation
description: A template for Parameter Estimation using the Catalax JAX library. Fit kinetic parameters to experimental data using advanced optimization algorithms and gradient-based methods.

name: Neural ODE
description: A template for Neural Ordinary Differential Equations using the Catalax JAX library. Combine neural networks with differential equations to model complex enzymatic systems and dynamics.

name: Universal ODE
description: A template for Universal Ordinary Differential Equations using the Catalax JAX library. Combine neural networks with differential equations to model model residual unknown behavior.

name: COPASI (Basico)
description: Model your data using COPASI through the basico PyEnzyme thin layer. Access powerful biochemical modeling capabilities with steady-state and time-course analysis.

name: PySCeS
description: Model your data using PySCeS through the pysces thin layer. Perform metabolic control analysis and steady-state modeling of biochemical networks.
